rooms.description: A spacious entrance with adequate lighting to welcome guests and provide smooth circulation.
Modern living area designed for relaxation and social interactions. Vastu compliant position aligning with the northeast corner to attract positive energy.
Functional kitchen space designed for efficient workflow. Vastu principles suggest placement in the southeast to harness energy.
Dining area integrated with living room for seamless transition. Positioned adjacent to the kitchen for convenience.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and en-suite bathroom. Vastu oriented towards the north for clarity.
Secondary bedroom designed for guests or family members. Located near common areas.
Dedicated home office space designed to promote productivity and quiet work environment. Placed away from noisy zones following Vastu guidelines.
A serene library space for reading and study. Ideally located in the northeast to encourage positive mental energy.
Compact yet comfortable living area for servants with basic amenities. Placed at the rear or south side to maintain privacy.
Primary bathroom serving master bedroom and other bedrooms. Vastu advises placement in the north-west for balance.
Service room for laundry and storage. Vastu placement near kitchen is recommended.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the main facade. Vastu recommends a slightly south-facing direction to welcome positive energy.
Large windows for natural lighting and ventilation placed along the north and east facades.
Balcony adjoining the living room to connect indoor and outdoor spaces.
Service entrance door for efficient access to the kitchen and servant's quarters.

notes: The plan is designed to adhere to local Indian building norms while incorporating Vastu principles where appropriate.
Industrial design elements are integrated in material choices and finishes, ensuring robust yet aesthetically pleasing interiors.
Open spaces ensure natural light and ventilation as per sustainable architecture guidelines.
